name: FiltererSendPacket
description: An event filterer that selectively filters SendPacket events based on packet type.
overview:
An event filterer that selectively filters SendPacket events based on packet type. This class allows you to create event listeners that only trigger for specific types of outgoing packets, reducing unnecessary event processing and improving performance.

Filterers are used with event listeners to control which events trigger your handler functions. The FiltererSendPacket specifically works with the SendPacket event to filter based on the packet type name.

constructors.description: Creates a new FiltererSendPacket instance with no type filter set. By default, this filterer will match all SendPacket events.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Sets the specific packet type name to filter for. Can be set to null to match all packets.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The simple class name of the packet to filter (e.g., "ChatMessageC2SPacket") or null.
